sprint_goal: Initialize project tracking, enforce strict standards, and refactor redundancy.

tasks.title: Create Feature List
tasks.description: Create 'feature_list.json' in the root directory. Populate it with the 10 goals from the Project Specification (Abstract Agent Logic, Standardize Prompt Management, Improve Reliability & Observability, Support for Extensibility, Strict Typing and Linting, Automated Verification Pipeline, Secure Credential & Secret Management, Resilient Error Recovery & State Persistence, Optimize Containerized Environments, Advanced Jira Workflow Integration). Set their status based on current implementation (mostly 'Passed' or 'In Progress').

tasks.title: Consolidate Prompt Logic
tasks.description: Refactor 'agents/cursor/agent.py' to import prompts from 'agents.shared.prompts'. Delete 'agents/cursor/prompts.py' as it is redundant. Ensure 'agents/shared/prompts.py' has all necessary functions (it seems to have identical logic).

tasks.title: Enforce Strict Mypy
tasks.description: Add '[tool.mypy]' section to 'pyproject.toml' with 'check_untyped_defs = true', 'disallow_any_generics = true', 'ignore_missing_imports = true'. Run 'mypy .' and fix any new errors that arise.

tasks.title: Verify Jira Workflow
tasks.description: Run 'python3 tests/verify_jira_workflow_improvements.py' to ensure the Jira integration is working as expected. If it fails, fix the issues.
